title: 龙之歌
description: Beat enemies and collect equipments, different equipments can improve properties and defense abnormal states.

title: 下班保卫战
description: 一个微信小游戏，点击老板获得金钱和分数，在金钱小于0时游戏结束

title: PathFinding
description:
Github: https://github.com/x739809514/PathFinding_Algorithms 

 This project is about Pathfinding algorithms. There are 3 methods here, NavMesh, A star and Funnel Algorithm. The Funnel Algorithm is independent with Unity, and it can be extracted for back-end

title: RFramework
description:
Github: https://github.com/x739809514/RFramework.

 This framework is mainly used for beginners who are just learning how to make games. It provides a simple system for event distribution, storage, scene switching, etc. The framework allows beginners to build their own 2D games based on this framework. Beginners can build their own 2D games based on this framework. At the same time, you can also learn the knowledge of related design patterns.

title: SocketLib
description:
Github: https://github.com/x739809514/SoketLib 

 This is a NetWork API library written by c#. It can be used for game back-end.

title: HotFixProj
description:
Github: https://github.com/x739809514/UHotFixProject

 This is a hotload project which is based on ILRuntime. I implemented an UI framework in this project. ILRuntime is a hotload solution for mobile games, which can let developers code in c#. ILRuntime's performance is great, it runs 10 times faster than xLua in mobile phones. If you want to know more details about how to use ILRuntime, please check the official document: https://ourpalm.github.io/ILRuntime/public/v1/guide/index.html

title: AnimationSystem
description:
Github: https://github.com/x739809514/AnimationSystem

 The traditional Animation Controllers are complex and easy to be messy. We can use Playable to build a custom Animation system. In this project, I built some nodes for animation graph: 'Mix', 'blendtree','random selector', 'AnimUnit', 'root'. All these nodes are controlled by AnimBehavior.

title: PuzzelGameFramework
description:
Github: https://github.com/x739809514/Lostlsland_Proj

 This is a simple puzzle game, it has several game systems, such as SceneManager, New Game Plus system, Saving system, EventSystem, BagSystem.
